    • Method Detail

      • executeWorkflowActivity

        public static java.util.List<ErrorData> executeWorkflowActivity(WorkItemContext workItemContext)
        Executes the workflow activity before save. If the error data list is not empty the issue will not be saved and an error message will be shown. Otherwise the actual workItemBean can me modified right before saving it If there is also a status change then the guards for status change were verified already in loadStatesTo() that means only those statuses were allowed to choose from which passed the guards, consequently the status change related activities are executed without testing the guards again If there were no status change (hook to the same status exists in the workflow) then the guards related to the hook are executed and the activities related are executed only if guard is passed
        Parameters:
        workItemContext -
        Returns:

      • loadStatesTo

        public static java.util.List<TStateBean> loadStatesTo(java.lang.Integer projectID,
                                      java.lang.Integer issueTypeID,
                                      java.lang.Integer statusIDFrom,
                                      java.lang.Integer personID,
                                      TWorkItemBean workItemBean,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> inputBinding)
        Load the next states possible to choose
        Parameters:
        projectID - not necessarily equals with workItemBean.getProjectID()
        issueTypeID - not necessarily equals with workItemBean.getListTypeID()
        statusIDFrom - may be null (if creating a new issue)
        personID -
        workItemBean - the original workItemBean
        Returns:
